name: Gecko-the-treasure-hunter
description:
Meet Gecko the treasure hunter. Adventure and Hunting treasure is his passion. Help him to collect coins and save him from the cold-hearted enemies. Collect as many coins as you can. 

Gecko the treasure hunter :
⚫ Collect coins to finish a level
⚫ Avoid Enemy
⚫ Shoot the fox
⚫ More levels and features coming soon!
